description: The Buttermilk Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry brings you the latest snow fall, snow surface conditions,  base depth, trail, and lift operations information.

name: Snow Report for Buttermilk Mountain
shortDescription: The Buttermilk Mountain Snow Report brought to you by SnoCountry provides the latest ski and snowboarding conditions for Buttermilk Mountain.
